articles.title: John Terry claims Rio Ferdinand snubbed him in Dubai over Anton racism accusation in 2011 - Daily Mail
articles.description: John Terry has revealed that Rio Ferdinand snubbed him on a beach in Dubai when he approached to clear the air over the 2011 racism accusation from his brother Anton.
